# Shiny

## Deploying

### Deploying to shinyapps.io

1. Install and attach packages
	+ `shiny`
	+ `shinyapps`
	+ `devtools`
2. Test app locally
	`runApp(path_to_app)`
3. Deploy to shinyapps.io
	+ `shinyapps::deployApp(path_to_app)`
